#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
		freopen("I.in","r",stdin);
	#endif
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n,k;
		int count=0;
		cin>>n>>k;
		if(k==1) cout<<n<<endl;
		else
		{
			while(n)
			{
				count+=n%k;
				n/=k;
			}
			cout<<count<<endl;
		}

	}
	return 0;
}
